vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.11.4;
son of: Uzziah (H5818K)
§ Athaiah = "Jehovah has helped"
a descendant of Judah through Perez; dwelt at Jerusalem after the return from exile in Babylon
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Ozías; tribu de Judá; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞他雅 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華曾幫助"
法勒斯的後代 #尼 11:4|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚他雅 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华曾帮助"
法勒斯的后代 #尼 11:4|
